sentence.Network_en: "I don't know why they left," he said dolefully.
sentence.Network_cn: “我不知道他们为什么离开，”他哀愁地说道。

sentence.Network_en: His mother looked at him dolefully when he told her he had joined the Army.
sentence.Network_cn: 当他告诉他的妈妈已经参了军时,他的妈妈伤心地看着他.

sentence.Network_en: Mrs. Trenor shook her head dolefully.
sentence.Network_cn: 雷诺太太悲伤地摇了摇头.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 悲哀-的英语翻译-bab.la词典 ... 悲哀的故事 jeremiad 悲哀地 dolefully 悲哀地 sadly.

entry.def: A doleful expression, manner, or voice is depressing and miserable.

example.ex: He gave me a long, doleful look.
example.tran: 他眼神悲伤地久久望着我。

means.word_mean: 1. with sadness; in a sorrowful manner;

sentences.sentence: "his mother looked at him dolefully when he told her he had joined the Army"

auth_sentence.content: "I know your tastes in food and wine, but not what's really on your mind," he sings dolefully.

auth_sentence.content: The more the PM dolefully droops, the more many of our theatre people brighten.
